verses.verse: כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> there לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will be no מוּעָף֮ <S%H4155><s%> Nevertheless the dimness לַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> her who מוּצָ֣ק <S%H4164><s%> [shall] not [be] such as [was] in her vexation לָהּ֒ כָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> when הָרִאשׁ֗וֹן <S%H7223><s%> at the first הֵקַ֞ל <S%H7043><s%> he lightly afflicted אַ֤רְצָה <S%H776><s%> the land זְבֻלוּן֙ <S%H2074><s%> of Zebulun וְאַ֣רְצָה <S%H776><s%> and the land נַפְתָּלִ֔י <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali וְהָאַחֲר֖וֹן <S%H314><s%> and afterward הִכְבִּ֑יד <S%H3513><s%> did more grievously afflict דֶּ֤רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [her by] the way הַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> of the sea עֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> beyond הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan גְּלִ֖יל <S%H1551><s%> in Galilee הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> of the nations

הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> The people הַהֹלְכִ֣ים <S%H1980><s%> that walked בַּחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> in darkness רָא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> have seen א֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> light גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> a great יֹשְׁבֵי֙ <S%H3427><s%> they that dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land צַלְמָ֔וֶת <S%H6757><s%> of the shadow of death א֖וֹר <S%H216><s%> upon them hath the light נָגַ֥הּ <S%H5050><s%> shined עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

הִרְבִּ֣יתָ <S%H7235><s%> Thou hast multiplied הַגּ֔וֹי <S%H1471><s%> the nation [לֹא כ] (לֹ֖ו <S%H3808><s%> not ק) הִגְדַּ֣לְתָּ <S%H1431><s%> [and] not increased הַשִּׂמְחָ֑ה <S%H8057><s%> the joy שָׂמְח֤וּ <S%H8055><s%> they joy לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> before כְּשִׂמְחַ֣ת <S%H8057><s%> thee according to the joy בַּקָּצִ֔יר <S%H7105><s%> in harvest כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> men יָגִ֖ילוּ <S%H1523><s%> [and] as [men] rejoice בְּחַלְּקָ֥ם <S%H2505><s%> when they divide שָׁלָֽל׃ <S%H7998><s%> the spoil

כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹ֣ל <S%H5923><s%> the yoke סֻבֳּל֗וֹ <S%H5448><s%> of his burden וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> and the staff שִׁכְמ֔וֹ <S%H7926><s%> of his shoulder שֵׁ֖בֶט <S%H7626><s%> the rod הַנֹּגֵ֣שׂ <S%H5065><s%> of his oppressor בּ֑וֹ הַחִתֹּ֖תָ <S%H2865><s%> For thou hast broken כְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as in the day מִדְיָֽן׃ <S%H4080><s%> of Midian

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every סְאוֹן֙ <S%H5430><s%> For every battle סֹאֵ֣ן <S%H5431><s%> of the warrior בְּרַ֔עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> [is] with confused noise וְשִׂמְלָ֖ה <S%H8071><s%> and garments מְגוֹלָלָ֣ה <S%H1556><s%> rolled בְדָמִ֑ים <S%H1818><s%> in blood וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will be for לִשְׂרֵפָ֖ה <S%H8316><s%> but [this] shall be with burning מַאֲכֹ֥לֶת <S%H3980><s%> [and] fuel אֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> of fire

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For יֶ֣לֶד <S%H3206><s%> For unto us a child יֻלַּד־ <S%H3205><s%> is born לָ֗נוּ בֵּ֚ן <S%H1121><s%> unto us a son נִתַּן־ <S%H5414><s%> is given לָ֔נוּ וַתְּהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> will rest הַמִּשְׂרָ֖ה <S%H4951><s%> and the government עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שִׁכְמ֑וֹ <S%H7926><s%> shall be upon his shoulder וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> shall be called שְׁמ֜וֹ <S%H8034><s%> and his name פֶּ֠לֶא <S%H6382><s%> Wonderful יוֹעֵץ֙ <S%H3289><s%> Counsellor אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> God גִּבּ֔וֹר <S%H1368><s%> The mighty אֲבִיעַ֖ד <S%H5703><s%> The everlasting שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> The Prince שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> of Peace

[לְמַרְבֵּה כ] (לְמַרְבֵּ֨ה <S%H4766><s%> great ק) הַמִּשְׂרָ֜ה <S%H4951><s%> of [his] government וּלְשָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> and peace אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> There קֵ֗ץ <S%H7093><s%> [there shall be] no end עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and over כִּסֵּ֤א <S%H3678><s%> upon the throne דָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> of David וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and over מַמְלַכְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4467><s%> and upon his kingdom לְהָכִ֤ין <S%H3559><s%> to order אֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> וּֽלְסַעֲדָ֔הּ <S%H5582><s%> it and to establish בְּמִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> it with judgment וּבִצְדָקָ֑ה <S%H6666><s%> and with justice מֵעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> then וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> from henceforth even for עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> ever קִנְאַ֛ת <S%H7068><s%> The zeal יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> will perform זֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise ס

דָּבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> a word שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אֲדֹנָ֖י <S%H136><s%> The Lord בְּיַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> into Jacob וְנָפַ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> and it hath lighted בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> upon Israel

וְיָדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> shall know הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people כֻּלּ֔וֹ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> [even] Ephraim וְיוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> and the inhabitant שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria בְּגַאֲוָ֛ה <S%H1346><s%> in the pride וּבְגֹ֥דֶל <S%H1433><s%> and stoutness לֵבָ֖ב <S%H3824><s%> of heart לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> that say

לְבֵנִ֥ים <S%H3843><s%> The bricks נָפָ֖לוּ <S%H5307><s%> are fallen down וְגָזִ֣ית <S%H1496><s%> with hewn stones נִבְנֶ֑ה <S%H1129><s%> but we will build שִׁקְמִ֣ים <S%H8256><s%> the sycomores גֻּדָּ֔עוּ <S%H1438><s%> are cut down וַאֲרָזִ֖ים <S%H730><s%> [them into] cedars נַחֲלִֽיף׃ <S%H2498><s%> but we will change

וַיְשַׂגֵּ֧ב <S%H7682><s%> shall set up יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Therefore the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צָרֵ֥י <S%H6862><s%> the adversaries רְצִ֖ין <S%H7526><s%> of Rezin עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> against וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹיְבָ֖יו <S%H341><s%> his enemies יְסַכְסֵֽךְ׃ <S%H5526><s%> together

אֲרָ֣ם <S%H758><s%> The Syrians מִקֶּ֗דֶם <S%H6924><s%> before וּפְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> and the Philistines מֵֽאָח֔וֹר <S%H268><s%> behind וַיֹּאכְל֥וּ <S%H398><s%> and they shall devour אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> gaping פֶּ֑ה <S%H6310><s%> with open mouth בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not שָׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> is not turned away אַפּ֔וֹ <S%H639><s%> For all this his anger וְע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> is still יָד֥וֹ <S%H3027><s%> but his hand נְטוּיָֽה׃ <S%H5186><s%> [is] stretched out still

וְהָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> For the people לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor שָׁ֖ב <S%H7725><s%> turneth עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> who הַמַּכֵּ֑הוּ <S%H5221><s%> not unto him that smiteth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor דָרָֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H1875><s%> them neither do they seek ס

וַיַּכְרֵ֨ת <S%H3772><s%> will cut off יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Therefore the LORD מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> from Israel רֹ֧אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> head וְזָנָ֛ב <S%H2180><s%> and tail כִּפָּ֥ה <S%H3712><s%> branch וְאַגְמ֖וֹן <S%H100><s%> and rush י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> in one

זָקֵ֥ן <S%H2205><s%> The ancient וּנְשׂוּא־ <S%H5375><s%> accept פָנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> accept ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הָרֹ֑אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> [is] the head וְנָבִ֥יא <S%H5030><s%> and the prophet מֽוֹרֶה־ <S%H3384><s%> that teacheth שֶּׁ֖קֶר <S%H8267><s%> lies ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הַזָּנָֽב׃ <S%H2180><s%> he [is] the tail

וַיִּֽהְי֛וּ <S%H1961><s%> become מְאַשְּׁרֵ֥י <S%H833><s%> For the leaders הָֽעָם־ <S%H5971><s%> of this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this מַתְעִ֑ים <S%H8582><s%> cause [them] to err וּמְאֻשָּׁרָ֖יו <S%H833><s%> and [they that are] led מְבֻלָּעִֽים׃ <S%H1104><s%> of them [are] destroyed

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֨ן <S%H3651><s%> after that עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in בַּחוּרָ֜יו <S%H970><s%> in their young men לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִשְׂמַ֣ח ׀ <S%H8055><s%> shall have no joy אֲדֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> Therefore the Lord וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְתֹמָ֤יו <S%H3490><s%> on their fatherless וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַלְמְנֹתָיו֙ <S%H490><s%> and widows לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יְרַחֵ֔ם <S%H7355><s%> neither shall have mercy כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For כֻלּוֹ֙ <S%H3605><s%> every חָנֵ֣ף <S%H2611><s%> for every one [is] an hypocrite וּמֵרַ֔ע <S%H7489><s%> and an evildoer וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> one פֶּ֖ה <S%H6310><s%> and every mouth דֹּבֵ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> speaketh נְבָלָ֑ה <S%H5039><s%> folly בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every זֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor שָׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> is not turned away אַפּ֔וֹ <S%H639><s%> For all this his anger וְע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> is still יָד֥וֹ <S%H3027><s%> but his hand נְטוּיָֽה׃ <S%H5186><s%> [is] stretched out still

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָעֲרָ֤ה <S%H1197><s%> burneth כָאֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> as the fire רִשְׁעָ֔ה <S%H7564><s%> For wickedness שָׁמִ֥יר <S%H8068><s%> the briers וָשַׁ֖יִת <S%H7898><s%> and thorns תֹּאכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> it shall devour וַתִּצַּת֙ <S%H3341><s%> and shall kindle בְּסִֽבְכֵ֣י <S%H5442><s%> in the thickets הַיַּ֔עַר <S%H3293><s%> of the forest וַיִּֽתְאַבְּכ֖וּ <S%H55><s%> and they shall mount up גֵּא֥וּת <S%H1348><s%> [like] the lifting up עָשָֽׁן׃ <S%H6227><s%> of smoke

בְּעֶבְרַ֛ת <S%H5678><s%> Through the wrath יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts נֶעְתַּ֣ם <S%H6272><s%> darkened אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> is the land וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> and the people כְּמַאֲכֹ֣לֶת <S%H3980><s%> shall be as the fuel אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> of the fire אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> no man אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> his brother לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> No יַחְמֹֽלוּ׃ <S%H2550><s%> shall spare

וַיִּגְזֹ֤ר <S%H1504><s%> And he shall snatch עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יָמִין֙ <S%H3225><s%> on the right hand וְרָעֵ֔ב <S%H7456><s%> but are hungry וַיֹּ֥אכַל <S%H398><s%> and he shall eat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׂמֹ֖אול <S%H8040><s%> on the left hand וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> are not שָׂבֵ֑עוּ <S%H7646><s%> and they shall not be satisfied אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man בְּשַׂר־ <S%H1320><s%> the flesh זְרֹע֖וֹ <S%H2220><s%> of his own arm יֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> they shall eat

מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <S%H4519><s%> Manasseh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim וְאֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> and Ephraim אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> Manasseh יַחְדָּ֥ו <S%H3162><s%> [and] they together הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> are against יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> [shall be] against Judah בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not שָׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> is not turned away אַפּ֔וֹ <S%H639><s%> For all this his anger וְע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> is still יָד֥וֹ <S%H3027><s%> but his hand נְטוּיָֽה׃ <S%H5186><s%> [is] stretched out still ס
